sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"医生"之意。
means: doctor ： 普通用词，泛指各科医生，即一切有行医资格的人。
physician ： 指医院的内科医生。
surgeon ： 指专修外科或专修人体某个部分的外科专科医生，这种医生一般需对患者进行手术治疗。
dentist ： 指专门从事治牙的医生。

word_mean: ［拉teacher］医师：美国指获得医学院、骨病学院、按摩学院、验光学院、足医学院、药学院、牙学院及兽医学院学位，国家发照准予从业的医疗专门技术人员
博士：获得大学最高学位的某一领域或学科的专家

sentence.Network_en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentence.Network_en: Doctor believed that his low sperm count was the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生认为他的精子数太低是问题所在。

sentence.Network_en: The athlete is checked by their physio or doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 由专用理疗师或医生为运动员做检查。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be very beneficial or desirable under the circumstances

lj.lj_ly: a 2-0 victory is just what the doctor ordered.
he will go for the doctor in Parliament next week.
lj.lj_ls: 下周在国会他会尽全力争取的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses 'learned person' and 'Doctor of the Church'): via Old French from Latin doctor 'teacher' (from docere 'teach')

entry.def: A doctor is someone who is qualified in medicine and treats people who are ill.

example.ex: Do not discontinue the treatment without consulting your doctor...
example.tran: 未经医嘱不要擅自中断治疗。

example.ex: Doctor Paige will be here right after lunch to see her.
example.tran: 佩奇医生一吃完午饭就会来这儿看她。

entry.def: A dentist or veterinarian can also be called doctor .
The doctor's is used to refer to the surgery or office where a doctor works.

example.ex: I have an appointment at the doctors.

entry.def: A doctor is someone who has been awarded the highest academic or honorary degree by a university.

example.ex: He is a doctor of philosophy.

entry.def: If someone doctors something, they change it in order to deceive people.

example.ex: They doctored the prints to make her look as awful as possible.
example.tran: 他们修改了照片，尽可能地丑化她的容貌。

entry.tran: (将毒药、麻药等)掺入(食物或饮料中)
entry.def: If someone doctors food or drink, they add a poison or drug to it.

example.ex: She had no doubt that it was he who had doctored her milk.
example.tran: 她毫不怀疑是他在她的牛奶里下了药。

sentences.sentence: "I felt so bad I went to see my doctor"

means.word_mean: 2. children take the roles of doctor or patient or nurse and pretend they are at the doctor's office;

sentences.sentence: "the children explored each other's bodies by playing the game of doctor"

means.word_mean: 3. a person who holds Ph.D. degree from an academic institution;

sentences.sentence: "she is a doctor of philosophy in physics"

means.word_mean: 1. alter and make impure, as with the intention to deceive;
3. restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken;

list.explanation: 为其雇主利益传播倾向性信息的代理人(尤指为政奔效劳而误导舆论界)

example.en: Things were going bad for the President,so he got himself a new spin doctor.
example.zh: 形势的发展对总统很不利，所以他给自已找了个新的能旋转方向的代言人。

list.explanation: (尤指在赛马中)作出极大努力，跑得很快

example.en: I suppose the chestnut horse will go for the doctor and get a huge win at this races.
example.zh: 我想那匹叫栗色马 一定会跑得很快,在 这次赛马会上准会大获成功。

example.en: I'll go for tlie doctor thai he's there.

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
See a doctor about her strained shoulder
Few doctors would have thought that there might be an exception to this.
It's possible to admire Oprah Winfrey and still wish Harvard hadn't awarded her an honorary doctor of law degree and the commencement(毕业典礼)speaker spot at yesterday's graduation.

a parent, relative, friend, or doctor outside the family, had higher self-esteem, higher grades, and lower substance use than peers whose role models were sports figures, singers, or other media characters.
The doctor who first identified it.

sentences.en: He would not dream of becoming a doctor.
sentences.cn: 他做梦也没想到要当大夫。

sentences.en: Dr.Edward is a most learned scholar.
sentences.cn: 爱德华博士是一个知识渊博的学者。

sentences.en: His father doctored there for over 20 years.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸在那儿行医20多年。

jushi.english: Seeing the sick child had fallen asleep, the doctor edged away.
jushi.chinese: 见病孩已经入睡,医生便悄悄走开了。

jushi.english: This country is being drained of its best doctors.
jushi.chinese: 这个国家最优秀的医生在不断外流。

jushi.english: The degree of Doctor of Philosophy is awarded to him.
jushi.chinese: 他被授予哲学博士学位。
